attributes.action: Extend protection given to transsexuals in the white paper, 'Proposals for a Single Equality Bill for Great Britain' to all transgendered people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposed discrimination legislation protects only those transgendered people who are seeking, undergoing, or have completed gender reassignment.  The vast majority of transgendered people do not seek reassignment and so have no legal protection.  These are people who can still be legally denied services, lose their jobs and suffer discrimination.  Protection for transgendered people should be the same as for other groups such as gay, lesbian and bisexual people
